pageContext.claim: “But if you look at what's happened to steel and aluminum, we practically built a new industry in a period of four, five months. It is incredible, what's happening.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a whopper. Trump has given various versions of an alleged call with the head of U.S. Steel. He sometimes says U.S. Steel would open six or seven facilities. U.S. Steel has not announced the opening of six facilities, nor is there evidence that Trump had a phone call with the head of U.S. Steel. The company has only announced the reopening of two blast furnaces at a plant in Illinois.
